game.title: The Lost City
game.objective: Find the lost city of Zerzura and retrieve the ancient artifact.
game.description: The city has been hidden for centuries, and many have tried to find it but failed. You must use your skills and resources to overcome the challenges ahead.
game.reward: 100 gold coins and the gratitude of the people
game.quest_giver: Rumors say the city is hidden deep within the Jungle of Wonders, talk to the wise old sage in the village for more information.

tasks.objective: Gather a map of the jungle
tasks.description: Find a local guide or gather information from the villagers about the jungle and its dangers.
Use your skills to navigate the fast-flowing river, or find a way to cross it safely.
Use your wits to decipher the clues and unlock the entrance to the lost city.
